action.text: Amendment SA 3900 as modified, and as amended, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 77.
Amendment SA 3900 ruled in order by the chair.

Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 3900, as modified, (the sections within the amendment regarding emergency designations) agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 28. Record Vote Number: 76.
Point of order that the emergency designations within the amendment violate the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3900, as modified.
Cloture on amendment SA 3900 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 75.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3900 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 3900 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blunt to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2733) Zika response and preparedness.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3900 as modified, and as amended, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 77.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3900 as modified, and as amended, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 77.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 3900, as modified, (the sections within the amendment regarding emergency designations) agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 28. Record Vote Number: 76.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 3900 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 75.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3900 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blunt to Amendment SA 3896.
